comments.body: Can’t figure out how to comment on the picture but you put the Java and the JS bindings at the same level both of them going through the runtime components and APIs. I assume you intentionally ignore the fact that this isn’t quite true for the Java bindings?

Yes. Libraries have arrows to both Runtime Components and Participant Server. I'm not saying all Libraries go to both, but some go to one, some to the other. But it never goes the other way around so Libraries are strictly "above" Runtime Components.
